mapper.select: select tu.`account`, tu.role_code, tud.`full_name`, tof.file_path as userAvatar, tud.`sex`, tud.`birthday`, tud.`height`, tu.`phone`, tud.`is_house`, tud.`is_car`, tud.`we_chat`, tud.`home_address`, tud.`office_address` from t_user tu left join t_user_detail tud on tud.account = tu.account and tud.is_delete = 0 left join t_oss_file tof on tof.file_key = tud.user_avatar and tof.is_delete = 0 where tu.is_delete = 0 and tud.account = #{account}
